Texts.Chs: 我更确信电池酸比这种饮料更安全。
Texts.Eng: I'm more convinced battery acid would be safer to drink than this beverage.

Texts.Chs: 果汁能灼伤叶族人的喉咙，不过味道还不错！
Texts.Eng: Juice burns the back of Floran's throat. Doesn't taste that bad though!

Texts.Chs: 那个颜色不是很有趣吗？
Texts.Eng: Well don't that color just scream 'fun'?

Texts.Chs: 如果你把一个有毒的东西和一个外星水果混合在一起，你会得到什么？没错，你猜对了。
Texts.Eng: What do you get if you blend a toxictop with an alien fruit? That's right, you guessed it.
